review: I am happy with this device,it still works well and I don't have a high internet speed,lots of stuff on amazon prime,I love the batman cartoons.
author: Albert A.

review: Met my needs and was easy to install and start using.
author: Hanna

review: My husband and I love this product easy to use
author: arcy

review: Google "how to install xbmc on fire tv stick". Once you get it opened up its the best 40$ you can spend. even with just 1channel.... if you are using it the way it came you have NO IDEA...great product. got mine for free from a buddie. will be buying at least one more soon.
author: Travis726

review: I enjoy using the amazon fire stick. its super easy to use as you just plug it into your hdmi slot. You must keep the stick plugged into the power cord. The content on the stick is amazing i think you need amazon prime to really enjoy this stick. I would definately reccomend it to friends and family.
author: Vanessa Kent

review: No complaints about the fire stick. It works quite well! I do wish more of my favorite older TV shows were available on Prime, but that's another issue all together.
author: Lucy Ruth Hughie

review: I have another fire stick and fire tv box. Love them all
author: Ebentley
